attributes.action: Allow Gary McKinnon to be tried and serve his sentance in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Allow Gary McKinnon to be tried and serve his sentence in the UK as opposed to being extradited to the USA. 

To this effect we want the Home Office to concede the case for extradition.

His state of mental health is such that such a punishment would be hugely disproportinate to his offence.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
